name: Kingfish Enchiladas
summary: Kingfish, a.k.a. King Mackerel, is a strong flavored sport fish which pairs well with the zesty flavor of salsa. Make sure to remove all of the dark meat from the fish when you clean it.
ingredients: 1 pound king mackerel fillets - cleaned, washed and cubed
directions: Combine fish cubes with Italian dressing
Let marinate for at least 30 minutes
Dredge fish cubes in flour and set aside
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly oil a 9x13 inch baking pan
In a non-stick frying pan, heat olive oil over medium high heat
Cook slowly, stirring occasionally until vegetables are soft
Stir in fish cubes and cook until fish is soft, about 5 minutes
Stir in half of the salsa and remove mixture from heat
Spoon mixture into tortillas, roll up and place seam down in prepared baking pan
Spoon remaining salsa over the  enchiladas and sprinkle with shredded cheese
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes
